data:
Top Daniel Sheehy Associate Professor of Physics Ph.D., 2001 - University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign 210-B Nicholson Hall, Tower Dr. 225-578-5852-Office sheehy@lsu.edu Personal Home Page Theoretical Condensed Matter I study the theoretical physics of quantum many-particle systems in which interactions
                     are qualitatively important and lead to novel behavior. Examples of the systems I
                     am interested in include Bose-Einstein condensates and paired fermion superfluidity,
                     that are phenomena from the realm of ultracold atoms, as well as condensed-matter
                     systems such as graphene (a one-atom thick layer of carbon with interesting electronic
                     properties), heavy-fermion materials, and high-temperature superconductors. Current and Select Publications D.E. Sheehy, "Fulde-Ferrell-Larkin-Ovchinnikov state of two-dimensional imbalanced
                     Fermi gases", Phys. Rev. A 92 , 053631, preprint. K. Sun, J.S. Meyer, D.E. Sheehy, S. Vishveshwara, "Oscillatory pairing of fermions
                     in spin-split traps", preprint . D.E. Sheehy, "Fermi Gases as a test bed for strongly interacting systems", 3 , 48 (2010), preprint . L. Radzihovsky and D.E. Sheehy, "Imbalanced Feshbach-Resonant Fermi Gases", Rep. Prog. Phys. 73 , 076501 (2010), preprint . S.-Q. Su, D.E. Sheehy, J. Moreno, M. Jarrell, "Dynamical Cluster Quantum Monte Carlo
                     Study of the Single Particle Spectra of Strongly Interacting Fermion Gases", Phys. Rev. A 81 , 051604 (2010), preprint . V. G. Rousseau, G. G. Batrouni, D. E. Sheehy, J. Moreno, and M. Jarrell, "Pure Mott
                     Phases in Confined Ultracold Atomic Systems", Phys. Rev. Lett. 104 , 167201 (2010), preprint . D.E. Sheehy and J. Schmalian, "Optical transparency of graphene as determined by the
                     fine-structure constant", Phys. Rev. B 80 , 193411 (2009), preprint . D.E. Sheehy, "Polarized superfluids near their tricritical point", Phys. Rev. A 79 , 033606 (2009), preprint . M. Veillette, E.G. Moon, A. Lamacraft, L. Radzihovsky, S. Sachdev, and D. E. Sheehy,
                     "Radio-frequency spectroscopy of a strongly imbalanced Feshbach-resonant Fermi gas", Phys. Rev. A 78 , 033614 (2008), preprint . D.E. Sheehy and J. Schmalian, "Quantum Critical Scaling in Graphene", Phys. Rev. Lett. 99 , 226803 (2007), preprint .
